rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever to adjust the chair height.

press_lever.description: Press the lever to adjust the chair settings.

clean_caster.description: Clean the caster to ensure it can move smoothly.

Rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster ensure its proper functioning.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel to ensure it can move smoothly.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel to check its smooth movement.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat for hygiene purposes.

slide_in_seat.description: Slide in the seat for comfort adjustment.

slide_out_seat.description: Slide out the seat for comfort adjustment.

clean_chair_leg.description: Clean the chair leg for hygiene purposes.

no_action_chair_leg.description: No action required for fixed chair leg.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair including the lever, caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg.

clean_whole_chair_again.description: Clean the entire chair for maintaining cleanliness.

check_whole_chair.description: Check the entire chair and apply necessary actions to maintain it well functioning.
